name: The Women on the 6th Floor
tagline: In 1960s Paris, a conservative couple's lives are turned upside down by two Spanish maids.

name: Chuck Berry Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll
tagline: This documentary covers the concert at the Fox Theatre in St. Louis, Missouri, to celebrate Chuck Berry's sixtieth birthday, and also discusses his life and career.

name: Bluffmaster!
tagline: A conman Roy, gets dumped by his girl-friend. Then he finds out he has a fatal disease. On the verge of death, he resolves to do some good, by helping his apprentice Dittu hoodwink the mobster who hurt his (Dittu's) family.

name: Wake Up Sid
tagline: A spoiled young adult living in Mumbai experiences a change in his lazy ways when he meets a woman at a party, who inspires him to "wake up".

name: On the Road
tagline: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

name: Hannah Arendt
tagline: A look at the life of philosopher and political theorist Hannah Arendt, who reported for The New Yorker on the war crimes trial of the Nazi Adolf Eichmann.

name: Son of Sardaar
tagline: Returning to his parents' village, a man becomes the latest target in a long-standing family feud.

name: Character
tagline: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

name: Holy Matrimony
tagline: A young Hutterite boy must marry his late brother's wife who comes from outside the community.

name: Rocket Science
tagline: Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.

name: The Ballad of Jack and Rose
tagline: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

name: Mozart's Sister

production.name: Centre National du Cinéma et de L'image Animée (CNC)

tagline: A re-imagined account of the early life of Maria Anna 'Nannerl' Mozart, five years older than Wolfgang and a musical prodigy in her own right.

name: Raavan
tagline: A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister, but later falls in love with her.

name: Kicking and Screaming
tagline: Following graduation, a handful of college students do nothing and talk about it wittily.

name: The Unholy Three
tagline: A sideshow ventriloquist, midget, and strongman form a conspiracy known as "The Unholy Three" and commit a series of robberies.

name: The 11th Hour
tagline: A look at the state of the global environment including visionary and practical solutions for restoring the planet's ecosystems.

name: Hobo with a Shotgun
tagline: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

name: Ashoka the Great
tagline: The Epic tale of King Asoka's life.

name: 56 Up
tagline: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born adults after a 7 year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.

name: A Time for Drunken Horses
tagline: Young Iranian Kurds (brothers and sisters) try to save the youngest of them, who is seriously ill.

name: The Assassination of Richard Nixon
tagline: Based on real life events, Assassination is set in 1974 and centers on a businessman who decides to take extreme measures to achieve his American dream.

name: Mysterious Skin
tagline: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

name: Human Nature
tagline: A woman is in love with a man in love with another woman, and all three have designs on a young man raised as an ape.

name: Split Decisions
tagline: When a boxer is killed because he wouldn't take a dive, his brother tries to find a way to avenge him even if only symbolically.

name: Muscle Shoals
tagline: A documentary that celebrates Rick Hall, the founder of FAME Studios in Muscle Shoals, Alabama, and the signature sound he developed in songs such as "I'll Take You There", "Brown Sugar", and "When a Man Loves a Woman".

name: The Girlfriend Experience
tagline: A drama set in the days leading up to the 2008 Presidential election, and centered on a high-end Manhattan call girl meeting the challenges of her boyfriend, her clients, and her work.

name: Jhoom Barabar Jhoom
tagline: A man and a woman, engaged to marry different people, spend a couple of hours chatting together at a train station only to fall for each other.

name: Frankie & Alice
tagline: A drama centered on a go-go dancer with multiple personality disorder who struggles to remain her true self and begins working with a psychotherapist to uncover the mystery of the inner ghosts that haunt her.

name: The Paperboy
tagline: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

name: The Living End
tagline: Luke is a gay hustler. Jon is a movie critic. Both are HIV positive. They go on a hedonistic, dangerous journey, their motto "Fuck the world".

name: Bachna Ae Haseeno
tagline: A young man and the three loves of his life, from 1996 to 2008.

name: The Opposite Sex and How to Live with Them
Wigstock: The Movie
tagline: Documentary/Concert film covering the annual Drag festival in New York City. Highlights include a performance by drag diva, Ru Paul, and the infamous Lypsinca.

name: Lady Chatterley
tagline: A French adaptation of the second (and much less well-known) version of D.H. Lawrence's erotic tale.

name: The Caveman's Valentine
tagline: A cave-dwelling man sets out to track down the killer of a homeless boy and bring him to justice.

name: The Secret of Kells
tagline: The animated story of the boy behind the famed Book of Kells.

name: Nobody Knows
tagline: In a small Tokyo apartment, twelve-year-old Akira must care for his younger siblings after their mother leaves them and shows no sign of returning.

name: Tabloid
tagline: A documentary on a former Miss Wyoming who is charged with abducting and imprisoning a young Mormon Missionary.

name: The Salton Sea
tagline: After his wife is murdered, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

name: Cry, the Beloved Country
tagline: A South-African preacher goes to search for his wayward son who has committed a crime in the big city.

name: Sophie Scholl: The Final Days
tagline: A dramatization of the final days of Sophie Scholl, one of the most famous members of the German World War II anti-Nazi resistance movement, The White Rose.

name: Where the River Runs Black
tagline: An orphaned boy who was raised in the Amazon jungle is brought back to civilization by a priest who knows his father.

name: The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters
tagline: Diehard video game fans compete to break World Records on classic arcade games.

name: The Circle

production.name: Direction du Développement et de la Coopération (DDC), Département Fédéral des Affaires Etrangères

tagline: Various women struggle to function in the oppressively sexist society of contemporary Iran.

production.name: Ministero per i Beni e le Attività Culturali (MiBAC)

name: Trees Lounge
tagline: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".

name: The Crazy Stranger

production.name: Ministère de la Culture de la Republique Française

tagline: A man is looking for a singer he had heard on cassette. He finds much more.

name: Teri Meri Kahaani
tagline: The true love between a couple in 1910, 1960 and 2012. Their love is so strong that even destiny wants to bring them together.

name: Maniac Cop
tagline: In New York City, a man in a cop's uniform starts killing people for no apparent reason.

name: Imagine Me & You
tagline: A newlywed bride becomes infatuated with another woman, who questions her sexual orientation, promoting a stir among the bride's family and friends.

name: C.S.A.: The Confederate States of America
tagline: Through the eyes of a british "documentary", this film takes a satirically humorous, and sometimes frightening, look at the history of an America where the South won the Civil War.

name: The Saddest Music in the World
tagline: A musical of sorts set in Winnipeg during the Great Depression, where a beer baroness organizes a contest to find the saddest music in the world. Musicians from around the world descend on the city to try and win the $25,000 prize.

name: The Promise
tagline: Empowered by the love of a slave (Jang), a royal concubine (Cheung) is given the chance to make an extraordinary decision.

name: Charlotte Gray
tagline: A young Scottish woman joins the French Resistance during World War II to rescue her Royal Air Force boyfriend who is lost in France.

name: Anvil: The Story of Anvil
tagline: Since 1978, Anvil has become one of heavy metal's most influential yet commercially unsuccessful acts. In 2006, after a fledging European tour Anvil sets out to record their thirteenth album and continue to follow their dreams.

name: Beer for My Horses
tagline: "Beer for My Horses" tells the story of two best friends that work together as deputies in a small town. The two defy the Sheriff and head off on an outrageous road trip to save the protagonist's girlfriend from drug lord kidnappers.

name: The Polar Express
tagline: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus' home.

name: Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress
tagline: Two youths sent for a Maoist "re-education" in the mountains fall in love with the village tailor's granddaughter.

name: The Circle
tagline: Some students at Runcie prep school form an elite club. The group is implicated in a cheating scandal and one of the club members dies mysteriously. Another member decides to try and discover the dangerous truth about Runcie.

name: Prisoner of the Mountains
tagline: Two Russian soldiers, one battle-seasoned and the other barely into his boots and uniform, are taken prisoner by an anxious Islamic father from a remote village hoping to trade them for his captured son.

name: Scarface
tagline: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.

name: Cheeni Kum
tagline: An egotistical 64-year-old chef and confirmed bachelor falls for a woman 30 years his junior.

name: Another Gay Movie
tagline: Four gay high school friends make a pact to lose their virginity before they go to college.
